{{also|师弟}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=师弟}}

===Etymology===
A compound of {{m|zh|師||teacher}} and {{m|zh|弟||younger brother}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=shīdì
|c=si1 dai6
|mn=qz:sir-tě/xm,zz:su-tē
|cat=n
}}

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# {{lb|zh|martial arts}}, young disciple, the [[junior]] [[fellow]] [[students]] in a [[Chinese]] [[martial arts]] [[school]], where the [[seniority]] is not based on the student's age or level of skill, but on the [[chronological]] order of following a particular [[sifu]], [[shifu]].
